thread.section_title: American Advisors Group Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Advisors Group | americanadvisorgroup.com
thread.title: Patricia Burkhardt
thread.title_full: American Advisors Group reviewed by Patricia Burkhardt

author: Patricia Burkhardt
title: Patricia Burkhardt
text: Everyone was nice but did not call when they said they would. Also, facts were confused often and the whole process took at least three times longer than first projected. Many facts were not explained to me ahead of time and that made it difficult to understand what was going on from one point to another.
